content: अंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अम्-तन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 86</ls>] {@--1@} Near. {@--2@} Last. {@--3@} Handsome, lovely; <ls>Me. 23</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 40</ls>, (where, however, the ordinary sense of ‘border’ or ‘skirt’ may do as well, though <ls>Malli.</ls> renders अंत by रम्य, quoting the authority of शब्दार्णव). {@--4@} Lowest, worst. {@--5@} Youngest. --तः ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} in some senses) {@--1@} ({%a%}) End, limit, boundary (in time or space); final limit, last or extreme point; स सागरांतां पृथिवीं प्रशास्ति <ls>H. 4. 50</ls> bounded by the ocean, as far as the sea; अपांगौ नेत्रयोरंतौ <ls>Ak.</ls>; उद्युक्तो विद्यांतमधिगच्छति <ls>H. 3. 114</ls> goes to the end of, masters completely; श्रुतस्य यायादयमंतमर्भकस्तथा परेषां युधि चेति पार्थिवः (where अंत also means end or destruction); जीवलोकसुखानामंतं ययौ <ls>K. 59</ls> enjoyed all worldly pleasures; आलोकितः खलु रमणीयानामंतः <ls>K. 124</ls> end, furthest extremity; दिगंते श्रूयंते <ls>Bv. 1. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Skirt, border, edge, precinct; a place or ground in general; यत्र रम्यो वनांतः <ls>U. 2. 25</ls> forest ground, skirts of the forest; ओदकांतात् स्निग्धो जनोऽनुगंतव्यः <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; उपवनांतलताः <ls>R. 9. 35</ls> as far as the borders or skirts; वृत्तः स नौ संगतयोर्वनांते <ls>R. 2. 58</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 19</ls>; <ls>Me. 23.</ls> {@--3@} End of a texture, edge, skirt, fringe or hem of a garment; वस्त्र°; पवनप्रनर्तितांतदेशे दुकूले <ls>K. 9</ls> (by itself in Veda). {@--4@} Vicinity, proximity, neighbourhood, presence; नाधीयीत श्मशानांते ग्रामांते <ls>Ms. 4. 116</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 162</ls>; <ls n="Y.">1. 143</ls>; गंगाप्रपातांतविरूढशष्पं (गह्वरं) <ls>R. 2. 26</ls>; पुंसो यमांतं व्रजतः <ls>Pt. 2. 115</ls> going into the vicinity or presence of Yama; अन्योन्यामंत्रणं यत्स्याज्जनांते तज्जनांतिकं <ls>S. D.</ls>; यां तु कुमारस्यांते वाचमभाषथास्तां मे ब्रूहि <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> (These four senses are allied). {@--5@} End, conclusion, termination (<ab>opp.</ab> आरंभ or आदि); सेकांते <ls>R. 1. 51</ls>; दिनांते निहितं <ls>R. 4. 1</ls>; मासांते, पक्षांते, दशाहांते &c.; एकस्य दुःखस्य न यावदंतं गच्छाम्यहं पारमिवार्णवस्य <ls>Pt. 2. 175</ls>; व्यसनानि दुरंतानि <ls>Ms. 7. 45</ls>; दशांतमुपेयिवान् <ls>R. 12. 1</ls> going to the end of the period of life (end of the wick); व्यसनं वर्धयत्येव तस्यांतं नाधिगच्छति <ls>Pt. 2. 180</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> in this sense, and meaning ‘ending in or with,’ ‘ceasing to exist with,’ ‘reaching to the end’; तदंतं तस्य जीवितं <ls>H. 1. 91</ls> ends in it; कलहांतानि हर्म्याणि कुवाक्यांतं च सौहृदं . कुराजांतानि राष्ट्राणि कुकर्मांतं यशो नृणां .. <ls>Pt. 5. 76</ls>; फलोदयांताय तपःसमाधये <ls>Ku. 5. 6</ls> ending with (lasting till) the attainment of fruit; यौवनांतं वयो यस्मिन् <ls>Ku. 6. 44</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 62</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 41</ls>; विपदंता ह्यविनीतसंपदः <ls>Ki. 2. 52</ls>; युगसहस्रांतं ब्राह्मं पुण्यमहर्विदुः <ls>Ms. 1. 73</ls> at the end of 1000 Yugas; प्राणांतं दंडं <ls>Ms. 8. 359</ls> capital punishment (such as would put an end to life). {@--6@} Death, destruction; end or close of life; धरा गच्छत्यंतं <ls>Bh. 3. 71</ls> goes down to destruction; योगेनांते तनुत्यजां <ls>R. 1. 8</ls>; एका भवेत्स्वस्तिमती त्वदंते <ls n="R.">2. 48</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 75</ls>; ममाप्यंते <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; अद्य कांतः कृतांतो वा दुःखस्यांतं करिष्यति <ls>Udb.</ls>; ओषध्यः फलपाकांताः <ls>Ms. 1. 46</ls>; अंतं या To be destroyed, perish, be ruined. {@--7@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A final syllable or letter of a word; अजंत ending in a vowel; so, हलंत, सुबंत, तिङंत &c. {@--8@} The last word in a compound. {@--9@} Ascertainment, or settlement (of a question); definite or final settlement; pause, final determination, as in सिद्धांत; उभयोरपि दृष्टोंतस्त्वनयोस्तत्त्वदर्शिभिः <ls>Bg. 2. 16</ls> (सदसतोः इत्यर्थः). {@--10@} The last portion or the remainder ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also); निशांतः, वेदांतः, &c. {@--11@} Underneath, inside, inner part; युष्मदीयं च जलांते गृहं <ls>Pt. 4</ls> in water, underneath water; सुप्रयुक्तस्य दंभस्य ब्रह्माप्यंतं न गच्छति <ls>Pt. 1. 202</ls> does not penetrate or dive into, sound, fathom; आशंकितस्यांतं गच्छामि <ls>M. 3</ls> shall dive deep into, fully satisfy, my doubts. {@--12@} Total amount, whole number or quantity. {@--13@} A large number. {@--14@} Nature, condition; sort, species; एतदंतास्तु गतयो ब्रह्माद्याः समुदाहृताः <ls>Ms. 1. 50.</ls> {@--15@} Disposition; essence; शुद्धांतः [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>Goth.</ab> {%andeis%}, {%and%}; <ab>Germ.</ab> {%ende%} and {%ent%}; also <ab>Gr.</ab> {%anti%}; <ab>L.</ab> {%ante%}].
